channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: The Whale Shark. Animated deep sea adventures with Captain Barnacles and his band of explorers. Dashi is swallowed by a whale shark so the Octonauts venture inside to rescue her.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vida the Vet
channel.desc: Vida's Happy Vet Day. When Zigzag hurts her foot on the job, Vida is there to help fix it. But Zigzag still has to deliver her packages in time for Vida's surprise Vet Day party.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: Bird Migration, Spain and Morocco. Meet the Go Jetters, four explorers on a global adventure! It's an aerial adventure above Gibraltar as the team follow a group of migrating birds.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: Whistler Mountain, Canada. Meet the Go Jetters, four explorers on a global adventure! Glitch causes a cable car catastrophe on Whistler Mountain in Canada.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Love Monster
channel.desc: Shooting Star Night. A group of fireflies accidentally spoil Love Monster's stargazing garden party when their light makes it too bright for everyone to see the stars in the night sky.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yukee
channel.desc: Lost and Found. Stripes has written a brilliant song, but his guitar string is broken, so he can't play it.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Roots and Fruits
channel.desc: Raspberry. Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's Raspberry performing It's Cool to Be Kind.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Colours. Educational series using Makaton sign language. Mr Tumble accidentally paints a rainbow, while Justin and his friends put on a colourful show at a theatre.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Cook Little Cook
channel.desc: Maverick Mouse. Jen and Small are having a movie night, but Jen has forgotten to buy some treats.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Playtime Towers
channel.desc: Star. Bella and Lift are visited by a shining star and set off to explore the floors of Playtime Towers. The first stop is Sketch in Boxtropolis - what will she be making today.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Back to the Pond. The puffin family enjoy a night-time adventure with a friendly frog.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Nick Cope's Popcast
channel.desc: Whole Lotta Fun. Today is the Popavision Song Contest, and Nick asks the Popcast Planners to help him come up with an idea for the song.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Postman Pat
channel.desc: A Speedy Car. Animation. Pat has to deliver a new remote-controlled car to Bill's party, but the car is accidentally switched on and zooms away across Pencaster.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piripenguins
channel.desc: The Wishing Tree. Nugget tries to make her friends' 'wishing tree' dreams come true but gets in a muddle.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Andy and the Band
channel.desc: Chicken Translator. Henny Feathers' chickens aren't laying eggs, so Andy and the Band devise a cracking plan.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Justin's House
channel.desc: Cat's New Job. Justin, Robert and Little Monster are excited to sit down in front of the TV because their neighbour Cat has a new job as the Justin Town newsreader.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Colourblocks
channel.desc: Silly Colouring. The Colourblocks discover that it can be fun to colour things wrong. Learn about choosing colours with the Colourblocks.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Magic Hands
channel.desc: The Lady of Shalott. Children's sign language poetry series. Aimee and Ashley are off to a land of knights and castles with The Lady of Shalott by Alfred, Lord Tennyson.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Love Monster
channel.desc: Babysitting Day. Love Monster looks after a baby koala for the day and experiences all the ups and downs of parenthood as he tries to keep her happy.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Sweetieland Saga. Evil Pea cheats Chilli out of winning floofy teddies at a funfair made from sweets, so Supertato and the Veggies must get the teddies back before it's too late.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Cafe. Bluey learns that adults take a little bit longer to make friends.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Big Lizard
channel.desc: Big Lizard's Big Itch. Big Lizard isn't happy in his skin! Cosima tries everything to stop him scratching until she realises that's exactly what he needs to do. He's shedding his skin.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Nikhil & Jay
channel.desc: Nikhil and Jay and the Anniversary. When Nikhil and Jay try to help Appa and Amma surprise each other for the anniversary of their first date, things quickly get out of hand.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: JoJo & Gran Gran
channel.desc: It's Time to Swim Underwater. JoJo and her cousin Lexi are learning how to swim underwater - but it's a little bit tricky. It's time for a Gran Gran plan.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Puffin Rock
channel.desc: Dinner at Bernie's. Oona helps Bernie impress his lady friend, Bernadette, with a delicious meal.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Sarah & Duck
channel.desc: Dewy Morning. Animation for preschool children. Sarah and Duck are so keen to visit the art shop, they get there too early and have to find things to keep themselves entertained.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Charlie and Lola
channel.desc: Say Cheese. Children's animation. Siblings Charlie and Lola deal with topics that affect their everyday lives. Lola is determined to stay clean and tidy for her school photograph.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Clangers
channel.desc: Find the Eclipse. Stop-motion animation. The Clangers gather to watch a solar eclipse, but as the moon moves towards the sun, the Iron Chicken's nest blocks the view.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: BeddyByes
channel.desc: Where's Yummy? MeMo and BaBa have fun spotting the Yummies - who are popping up everywhere today. The friends learn that their fun game is actually a hunt for Yummy Dog, who is missing.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: In the Night Garden
channel.desc: Makka Pakka's Trumpet Makes a Funny Noise. Series for young children about a magical place. Igglepiggle and Upsy Daisy visit Makka Pakka and discover a stone stuck in his trumpet.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
channel.desc: Rob Delaney - Ten in the Bed. A story read by a special guest. Rob Delaney reads and signs a Bedtime Story about ten cuddly friends trying to go to bed.
